channel.title: Business Transformation on FinanClub

item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:1129 Chances: Oracle leads stocks to watch with AI and cloud play, along with Amazon rival MercadoLibre. Oracle announces new Oracle Cloud for Australian Government and Defense to meet growing global demand. Wendy’s implements Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications Suite and moves to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for improved business insights.
